result.eng: I asked that person a question.
result.ga: Chuir mé ceist ar an duine sin
result.orig: Chuir mé ceist ar an duine sin
result.html: Chuir mé ceist ar an duine sinI asked that person a question.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir mé ceist ar an duine sinI asked that person a question.

result.eng: They asked me the same question again and again.
result.ga: Chuir siad an cheist chéanna orm arís agus arís
result.orig: Chuir siad an cheist chéanna orm arís agus arís
result.html: Chuir siad an cheist chéanna orm arís agus arísThey asked me the same question again and again.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir siad an ċeist ċéanna orm arís agus arísThey asked me the same question again and again.

result.eng: He asked me a question but I didn't answer him.
result.ga: Chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dó
result.orig: Chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dó
result.html: Chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dóHe asked me a question but I didn't answer him.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé ceist orm aċ níor ṫug mé freagra dóHe asked me a question but I didn't answer him.

result.eng: She asked the priest's advice on the matter.
result.ga: Chuir sí an cheist i gcomhairle an tsagairt
result.orig: Chuir sí an cheist i gcomhairle an tsagairt
result.html: Chuir sí an cheist i gcomhairle an tsagairtShe asked the priest's advice on the matter.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sí an ċeist i gcoṁairle an tsagairtShe asked the priest's advice on the matter.

result.eng: I asked the woman for a glass of water.
result.ga: D'iarr mé gloine uisce ar an bhean
result.orig: D'iarr mé gloine uisce ar an bhean
result.html: D'iarr mé gloine uisce ar an bheanI asked the woman for a glass of water.
result.ponchtml: D'iarr mé gloine uisce ar an ḃeanI asked the woman for a glass of water.

result.eng: We have asked for more information.
result.html: Tá tuilleadh eolais iarrtha againnWe have asked for more information.
result.ponchtml: Tá tuilleaḋ eolais iarrṫa againnWe have asked for more information.

result.eng: When I was asked what kind of room I wanted in the hotel, I answered carefully.
result.ga: Nuair a tugadh mo rogha seomra dom san óstán d'fhreagraíos go cúramach
result.orig: Nuair a tugadh mo rogha seomra dom san óstán d'fhreagraíos go cúramach
result.html: Nuair a tugadh mo rogha seomra dom san óstán d'fhreagraíos go cúramachWhen I was asked what kind of room I wanted in the hotel, I answered carefully.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a tugaḋ mo roġa seomra dom san óstán d'ḟreagraíos go cúramaċWhen I was asked what kind of room I wanted in the hotel, I answered carefully.
